title: 43. The Comedian-Ophthalmologist Will See You Now
description: Dr. Will Flanary, a.k.a Dr. Glaucomflecken, has always been a comedy fan. During the pandemic, he found an audience. But should doctors be funny with their patients? Bapu Jena asks when laughter is — and isn’t — the best medicine.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
